description: Represents inmate admissions to the NYS Department of Corrections and Community Supervision for a new offense or for a parole violation by month of admission.  Includes data about admission type, county, gender, age, and crime.

metadata.attribution: NYS Department of Corrections and Community Supervision

name: Prison Admissions: Beginning 2008
